function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Consumers avoiding medical offices and using telemedicine and home delivery","Impact":"Possible exposure to contagious diseases due to avoiding medical facilities","Mitigation":"Encouraging regular medical check-ups and vaccination schedules","Technologies":"Telemedicine, home delivery systems","People":"Consumers, high-risk individuals","Owner":"Health authorities, medical professionals"},{"Description":"Consumers not adhering to expert-recommended behaviors","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, education on effective preventive measures","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, mobile applications","People":"General public, at-risk individuals","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Market segment with low perception of threat and defensive avoidance","Impact":"Proliferation of misinformation and ineffective risk mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Targeted education and awareness initiatives, engagement with skeptical individuals","Technologies":"Social media, online communication platforms","People":"Segment of the population with low perception of threat","Owner":"Health communication professionals, community leaders"}]}
